NOT A SCRIPT, IF THIS IS IN GAME YOU ARE LOSTScripts are generally a series of click-thru lines until you reach a choice₿ indicates a forced new line without clearing text (this is often used to specify the speaker)₽ indicates choice text₼ indicates choice link in the form of the name of the new script text file in this folder.Choice lines must end with two random characters (implementation quirk, too lazy to fix)
